bibl.title: with contributions by R.S. BAGNALL, A. BENAISSA, A.K. BOWMAN, A. BÜLOW-JACOBSEN, D. COLOMO, J. CHAPA, T. GAGOS, H.-C. GÜNTHER, E.W. HANDLEY, R. HATZILAMBROU, N. LITINAS, M. MALOUTA, A. NODAR, C.E. RÖMER, P. SCHUBERT, D.N. SEDLEY, J.D. THOMAS, Y. TRNKA-AMRHEIN, S.R. WEST, J. WHITEHORNE, The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume LXXIII (Nos 4931-4967) in Honour of Peter Parsons and John Rea. (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 94.)
bibl.note: P. Oxy. LXXIII, 4931-4967. - I. Theological Texts (4931-4934). - II. Comedy (4935-4937). - III. New Literary Texts (4938-4945). - IV. Known Literary Texts (4946-4949). - V. Subliterary Texts (4950-4952). - VI. Documentary Texts (4953-4967).
